title: Interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream or dream through the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing curtains in a dream has many meanings. His sight can be a sign of good or a harbinger of evil. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream, depending on the condition and circumstances of the dreamer and what if he or she is a single man or woman or pregnant. Today, through the vision website, we will discuss the interpretation in detail of seeing curtains in a dream, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Kathir. Al-Nabulsi and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing curtains covering all the windows of the house in a dream indicates that the dreamer cares about the privacy of his home and hides many secrets. Seeing a married man wearing curtains in a dream indicates that his wife is a good woman with good morals. Good reputation and good reputation. Seeing white curtains in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s life is full of stability and reassurance. Seeing a student going blind in a dream indicates the great success and distinction he will achieve in his academic life. Seeing curtains in a dream indicates positive changes in the dreamer’s life. Seeing curtains falling in a dream indicates It indicates a big secret in the dreamer’s life that will be revealed soon. Seeing curtains hanging on the door of the mosque in a dream indicates that the dreamer is violating prayer and neglecting to worship. Seeing red curtains in a dream shows that the dreamer loves someone but does not admit it. Seeing black curtains in a dream is It indicates worries and sorrows in the dreamer’s life. Seeing yourself buying curtains in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with many good things in his life. See also: Interpretation of seeing the roof of a house in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a woman alone buying curtains in a dream. The date of her upcoming wedding. Seeing individual white curtains in a dream expresses a feeling of happiness and joy in her life always. Seeing women alone hanging curtains in a dream indicates her future full of goodness and happiness. Seeing isolated people wearing red curtains in a dream indicates that she is in a relationship with a young man who has a happy and stable emotional relationship. Seeing green curtains in a dream indicates a man’s presence in a righteous, moral and religious life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bed in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman buying curtains in a dream announces good and abundant livelihood for her and her family. Seeing a married woman with many Beautiful curtains in a dream shows that she will have many children. Seeing a married woman with blue curtains in a dream shows that he has good health and a sound body. A married woman seeing beautiful curtains in a dream indicates that God will bless her with a child soon, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing the knee of a house in a dream: Interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman buying curtains in a dream bodes well for her in the near future.

title: Interpretation of rape in a dream for different situations

preview.html: In our article today, we will discuss the interpretation of rape in a dream. When someone dreams of rape, he feels fear, terror, and anxiety that this dream will come true. Therefore, the dream of rape is one of his terrible visions. friends. There is a logical explanation for this, but the details of each dream and the condition of its owner are what determine its correct interpretation. Through the following lines on the encyclopedia website, we will explain in detail the interpretation of rape in a dream. Interpretation of rape in a dream Symbol of rape in a dream Rape in a dream indicates that the perpetrator of this act has bad manners in reality. There are some interpreters who saw that a dream about rape could be a sign of The fortuneteller's imminent marriage, whether a man or a woman. There is a consensus among commentators that a dream of sexual assault is a warning to the dreamer of a big problem for him that will make him feel humiliated in his life. Some interpretive scholars believe that if someone dreams of rape, then this dream is a message to him about The necessity of repenting to God, staying away from everything that angers Him, and abandoning taboos. Rape in a dream may indicate that the dreamer seeks to earn his money through illegal means. Interpretation of a dream about relatives harassing single people: Whoever sees in her dream that a relative of hers, such as her uncle, father, or brother, is raping her, then this It means that soon there will be a big problem between her and the perpetrator of this act. If an unmarried woman dreams that someone wants to rape her, her dream indicates that there is someone conspiring against her in her life, and the vision here is a warning for her to beware of him because he wants to harm her. The dream indicates For a single woman to be attacked by unknown people indicates that there are sorrows and anxiety on her way. As for the one who dreams that one of her friends or relatives is trying to attack her, this indicates that someone holds a grudge against her and is spreading her secret. Interpretation of rape in a dream for a married woman who saw in her dream that a stranger raped her The dream indicates the existence of problems between her and her husband that made her lose confidence in him. This vision may indicate that she made a major mistake that caused the rift of her family life. If a married woman sees in her dream that one of her relatives, such as an uncle, brother, or father, was raped, this indicates The emergence of problems in her family that causes hatred between them, and also indicates the presence of crises on the way to her. Also, the harassment of relatives in a married woman’s dream symbolizes the emergence of financial problems in the family environment that lead to the accumulation of debts. A married woman’s dream that someone pretends to be in a hurry indicates That this person will solve a problem that concerns her. A dream that shows that the husband raped another woman in a dream indicates that the dreamer does not enjoy security and love in her relationship with her husband, and the vision may indicate the presence of problems between the dreamer and her husband, as the vision here is a message to try to fix the situation between them. Interpretation of a dream about raping a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams that a handsome man rapes her, this means that she will give birth to a boy with beautiful qualities. But if the perpetrator is ugly, this indicates that he will contract the disease in the coming season. Whoever saw it in her dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing stolen gold in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold in a dream Gold is a precious metal because of its great value in a woman’s life, especially because women often prefer to wear it. It is worth noting that gold is the most expensive adornment for many women. Remaining in a state of fear. In fact, he warned him, and seeing it being stolen in a dream is one of the hateful and terrifying visions, and this vision, like the rest of the visions, has specific meanings, and this is what we are. This article will indicate the interpretation of a dream about seeing gold stolen in a dream.Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold in a dream. In this regard, we will study for you the most prominent and important interpretations of this vision, citing quotes from great dream interpreters, and this interpretation is as follows: Seeing gold stolen in a dream symbolizes To the imminent appearance and the occurrence of something bad in the dreamer’s life. Also, losing gold in a dream indicates that the dreamer will miss an important opportunity due to his negligence. But if a person known to the dreamer steals gold in a dream, this symbolizes the benefit that the thief gets like the person who stole it. In If the thief is unknown, this indicates harm to the monarch and this befalls him. Whereas if the stolen gold is obtained in the dream, it is a sign of comfort for the dreamer after the anxiety, tension, and sadness that he has overcome. Dreaming of gold being stolen in a dream symbolizes the death of someone dear to the dreamer, whether He was a friend or relative. As for someone who sees in his dream that he is stealing his wife’s gold, this indicates the benefit and livelihood that the wife will get from her husband. This vision shows the dreamer’s fear of the future, his anxiety, and his fear of losing and losing his money. Likewise, anyone who sees himself stealing a gold center This may indicate a bonus and the increase that the dreamer will receive in the field of forensic sciences. Interpretation of a dream of stealing gold in a dream. See also: Interpretation of dreams of three golden corpses in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of stealing gold for single people. This theft is hateful, shameful, and forbidden in religion and Sharia, so seeing This theft in a dream is a frightening matter, so we will provide an explanation for seeing an unmarried woman stealing gold through the following points: There is no doubt that seeing this theft in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of the delay in her marriage, in addition to the fact that no one will propose to her. If an unmarried woman sees someone If an acquaintance steals her own gold and she felt sorry for this heinous act, this indicates that she has been liberated from worries and sorrows. When seeing an unmarried woman stealing gold, this indicates that there are obstacles that she will suffer from in her days, which may be delaying her marriage. But if an unmarried woman sees As for herself stealing her neighbors’ gold, this is an indication that she will be able to achieve all her goals and fulfill her ambitions. Also, if a single girl sees herself stealing her friends’ chain and she is happy about it. This may indicate that he will hear happy and enjoyable news and events, so he will be happy and listen to it. As for For an unmarried, previously engaged woman to see in her dream that she found her stolen formula, this indicates her return to her fiancé. Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold in a dream Viewer

title: Learn about the interpretation of buying a house in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Buying a house in a dream Dream landmarks are among the things that bring many interpretations and inquiries to many people, and this vision is one of them, as it brings good news and sustenance to the dreamer, as well as harm and warnings not to fall. Sin...buying a house in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Buying a house in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about buying a house. If a poor person dreams that he is buying a house, this indicates an increase in his worries and the acquisition of good and sufficient food. If the dreamer is sick, this is a sign of his recovery from the disease. If the house is white Whoever sees himself in a dream buying a house that is not ready, this symbolizes that his work is not completely completed. Buying a house made of mud indicates that he is a hardworking person and is struggling to earn his money from halal means. Some commentators believe that the person who is moving to another new house, but he does not know The owner or the area, this is evidence that he has committed many sins and must return to God. Buying a house in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that the interpretation of seeing a large house in a dream for a rich person indicates an increase in his wealth and the acquisition of abundant money through legitimate means, and symbolizes a breakthrough in His livelihood and the removal of his worries. If the dreamer sees that he is buying a used house, this indicates his relationship with someone he loves, and it is an indication that he is under great pressure and anxiety and that he is going through a very difficult time. The dream indicates the failure to achieve his dreams and goals due to the problems surrounding him, his instability, his feeling of remorse and discontent, and his inability to pay. His debts. If the dreamer sees himself buying a house made of gold, this means that he has suffered many trials or lost someone close to him. If you have a dream and do not find its interpretation, go to Google and type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site. Buying a house in a dream for a single womanIf she sees The girl herself buys an unfinished house, this indicates that she is attached to someone, but this relationship will not be completed. Interpretation scholars agreed that seeing her new house indicates that there will be many changes in her life for the better in the near future and symbolizes her desire to achieve many Successes and progress in her career. This dream indicates that she will soon marry a good man who will make her happy. If she sees that she is working with someone to buy a house, this indicates that her wedding is approaching. Buying a house in a dream for a married woman Buying an old house in a dream for a married woman indicates She will face many problems that will greatly affect the stability of her marital relationship. If she sees that she is buying a huge house, this indicates that she and her husband will increase their livelihood, and that they will receive a lot of kindness and blessings, and if it is tight, this is evidence of a serious financial crisis. If she sees herself living in a house thick with mud, this indicates many problems and disagreements with her husband, and if it is made of gold, this is a sign that she will be exposed to fire in the near future. Seeing her buying a new house and closing the door on herself while she is inside is evidence of her strong adherence to her religion. And its principles, and it does not

title: Clues and meanings about the interpretation of traveling by plane in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman traveling by plane in a dream? Details of her happy married life. Interpretation of seeing traveling by plane in a dream? Evidence of an abundance of food and goodness in her life. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream of traveling by plane? Proof of the ease of her birth. Interpretation of seeing a man traveling by plane in a dream? The numbers were investigated. Wishes are far-fetched. Interpretation of a dream about traveling in a plane that cannot take off? It indicates the difficult financial circumstances of a man. Considering traveling by plane for individuals. Seeing an unmarried or unmarried girl traveling by plane in a dream is evidence of the speed of her connection and marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As for the girl who sees... She herself travels by plane in a dream without fear, as this indicates her marriage to Saleh. When she travels to perform Umrah in a dream, this indicates the existence of a relationship with a pious person. Interpretation of traveling by plane for a married woman: Seeing a married woman traveling by plane in a dream is evidence of her happy married life and the stability of her life, according to the interpretation Ibn Sirin, God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for seeing an airplane in a dream, it indicates an abundance of food and kindness in one’s life. But a woman who sees herself traveling by plane in fear in a dream indicates her ongoing marital problems and quarrels with her husband. A woman’s dream of traveling by plane indicates marital infidelity. Air travel for pregnant women. Seeing a pregnant woman traveling by plane in a dream is evidence of the ease of childbirth, and God is the Most High. Also, seeing a plane flight in a dream indicates that she will give birth to a healthy child. As for dreaming of traveling by plane while feeling afraid, it indicates the difficulty and problems of childbirth. A man’s vision of air travel. Vision A student traveling on a military plane in a dream indicates his success in studying and the fulfillment of dreams and desires, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As for seeing a man traveling by plane in a dream, it is evidence of satisfying desires that are difficult to achieve. Seeing traveling by plane with a feeling of joy in a dream means that the man will gain a lot of money. Money is the result of hard work. But seeing a sick person traveling by plane, it is better not to interpret it, because it indicates the imminent death of the dreamer. As for seeing a man, who has arrived at his station after traveling by plane, it indicates that he will have a good son from him. title: How do you interpret your dream?

preview.html: You will have a vision that is either clear, meaning clear symbols, or hidden through incomprehensible symbols, so join us to learn how to interpret your dream from gptafser.com/. Can you learn to interpret dreams? It is a talent first and then you have to learn it. There are some books dedicated to the science Interpretation of dreams by great Arab and Muslim scholars from time immemorial, and some of them are on the Internet. You can learn to interpret dreams by reading a lot and understanding the interpretation of each symbol. You cannot rely on reading only, but you must have a talent for interpretation, even if it is little, so that it is based Study to it. Take each symbol and learn its meaning, knowing the social position of the dreamer because it is the primary factor in interpreting the dream. If you cannot connect the symbols together, you cannot take risks and interpret. The first interpretation of the dream occurs, that is, it becomes reality, so you must be careful when Interrupting your vision, in dreams, is a sign of good tidings. See also: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, letter Tama, what is the interpretation of a dream? It is the interpretation of a vision that expresses the future of the dreamer and what will happen to him in days, months, or years, according to each vision. There are dreams that are interpreted in a year, meaning that the dreamer becomes Within a year, and there are months and there are days. Interpretation of dreams with talent and the development of science. The signs and symbols that a person sees during sleep are far from reality. But they have connotations that express reality, and they also have known people. The inner part of the vision is taken into account during interpretation Not everyone can interpret dreams, he must be well versed in the science of interpretation. He has a talent and connects symbols together and does not ignore any symbol in the vision. You know it is good when they ask you about your family situation and the current season you are living in. It is possible that there is The topic occupied your mind in reality to the point that it controlled you in the dream world. In this case we can say that this vision is a dream. The interpretation of the dream depends on this point , where the car means moving from one state to another. Do not overlook the marital status of the fortuneteller, married, single, pregnant, divorced, widowed. The gender of the dreamer, male or female, of course changes a lot in the interpretation. The mental state of the dreamer must be taken into account, because Not every dream is real and interpreted, there is a nightmare that is not taken into account. Likewise, the subconscious mind causes incomprehensible dreams because the person is dealing with some things in his life, whether they are problems or work pressure. You should ask the dreamer about the time of the dream, i.e. did he wake up at noon or dawn? Or at night. For example, it is said that a dream at night comes true within a matter of years. A dream at noon will come true within months. A dream at dawn or morning becomes a reality within days to a month. Read also: Interpretation of dreams by Ibn Sirin, the letter L. title: The 50 most important interpretations of seeing a puppy in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a puppy in a dream: Some people may feel concerned because the puppy is just a small dog that does not have any harm in reality, especially for those who love small dogs and are comfortable handling and petting them without being bothered by this problem. There are many interpretations that differ depending on the details, and we will learn about them below. Interpretation of seeing a puppy in a dream. What is the interpretation of a puppy in a dream? A puppy could be a sign of mutual benefit between two parties or indicate bad morals and irresponsible behaviors that bring a person into his reality and cause him to lose a lot of trust between him. And among those he deals with. Seeing an abnormal person in a dream is evidence that his actions have exceeded what is possible and he needs to undo those actions and correct himself in order to be accepted by people, as everyone has avoided dealing with him recently. If he sees him walking with him on his street while he is white, He is the one who is trying to benefit him with his knowledge, because it is ruining his life. If a ferocious attack occurs by this puppy on the dreamer, then he is about to be exposed to a malicious enemy who will use all tricks to undermine him. He must be careful and cautious in dealing with those who hate him, and he must have a means of defense not to do so. With that. He makes them pray to him.But if he finds him dead in front of his house and he is actually a friend of his who feels comfortable with him and goes with him everywhere, he really loses the most loyal people, the ones closest to his heart and often his partner. Or the only person who hides feelings of love and friendship. What is the interpretation of a puppy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? The imam said: The puppy does not express goodness in most cases, as it is one of the animals that pollutes the bowl in which it eats, and it is forbidden. But if he sees that the puppy is slaughtered And he eats his meat, there is enmity between him and a certain person for a long time, but he overpowers him and takes away all his rights if he had his rights taken away before. If this puppy bites him and affects him a lot, then there is a friend who considers him loyal and sincere, but he is surprised that he is traitorous and traitorous. If he eats milk in his sleep And he found that it was puppy milk, so there are some problems that happen to him that do not make him know right from wrong, and it is better for him not to make a decision in important matters. Your dream will find its interpretation in seconds. Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site from Google. A puppy in a dream for a single woman. The dream of an unmarried girl in a dream has more than Meaning according to the shape and color of the puppy. Seeing her in bright white expresses the happiness she will experience with her life partner in the near future. As for seeing a black puppy, she must prepare for some problems in her personal or emotional life. She meets a vile man who is not worthy of marrying her, but she follows him despite all the advice she receives from her family and friends. If a girl is bitten by a strong puppy without anyone noticing her, and while she is neglectful, she will be in big trouble because of an evil and malicious person she knows, who is taking advantage of her innocence. And her kindness in his nefarious purposes. If the puppy tried to bite her, but she escaped and was able to escape, this is a good sign that she survived a conspiracy that almost happened inside her, but God is peace. Seeing a gray puppy is a sign that she is miserable in her life

title: Interpretation of eating rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Eating rice in a dream. Rice is a type of starch that helps one feel full because it contains fibers that are beneficial to the body and is used in daily meals. Scientists have said in explaining and interpreting eating rice in a dream, so follow us. Eating rice in a dream. Interpretation scholars say that seeing rice in a dream is news. Pleasant for the dreamer and the abundant nutrition he will receive soon. Eating rice in a dream means that you will earn a lot of abundant money and that the situation will be good in the near future. As for the dreamer who sees her eating rice in a dream and enjoying it, this foretells that she will achieve many ambitions and aspirations. If he sees If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating rice and feels disgusted by it, this means that he will hear a lot of bad news in the coming period. If a man sees himself eating rice in a dream, this means that he will be safe at work and will reach the highest positions. As for the dreamer who sees the peel Rice in a dream, this means that he will collect a lot of money in the coming days. If the dreamer sees cleaning and purifying rice in a dream, it symbolizes staying away from pleasures and desires and not committing sins and misdeeds. Eating rice in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin, may God have mercy on him, says that seeing rice in a dream indicates There is a lot of goodness and many benefits that you will gain. Also, seeing an unemployed person eating rice in a dream, foretells that he will obtain a prestigious job, from which he will reap abundant money. Seeing the dreamer cooking rice in a dream means that he will obtain many great benefits soon. As for eating rice with milk in a dream, this means that the dreamer will face health problems in the coming days and must be careful. If the student sees in a dream that he is eating grains of rice, this promises him the excellence and brilliant success that he will achieve in his life. If the dreamer is suffering from problems and sees in If the fiancée dreams of eating rice mixed with soil, this means that her relationship with her partner will end and she will suffer from severe psychological exhaustion. What is the interpretation of seeing eating rice in a dream for a single woman? If an unmarried girl dreams of eating Rice, this means abundant wealth that she will gain soon. Also, seeing the dreamer eating rice in a dream means that she will earn a lot of abundant money in the coming days. If the dreamer dreams of eating raw rice, it shows that he carries many good qualities and many good things in life. But if you see rice mixed with soil in a dream, this means that there is an evil person with him who is desecrating his reputation among people. Seeing the dreamer cooking rice and eating it in a dream means that the date of her marriage to a good person is approaching and she will be happy with him. As for eating rice with meat in a dream, this means that The dreamer will achieve many successes and excel in her life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating rice and refuses to eat meat, this means that he will enter into a failed romantic relationship that will cause psychological problems.

title: What you have never heard of is to see a black dress in a dream for a man

preview.html: Seeing the color black in a dream is considered one of the most important visions that many people wonder about, because this vision has two contradictory aspects in reality, and the meaning of the color black in reality, and from this meaning the concept of the black dress in a dream was derived within these two different directions. In fact, the black dress can be interpreted as the desperate and miserable situation that the fortuneteller is living in. It can also be explained that this fortuneteller is one of his hobbies and ambitions, and his interest in his elegance and obtaining the best popular clothes on the stage. Dream interpretation scholars differed regarding this vision, and their difference arose as a result of the difference in the situation in which he was found. The black dress in the dreamer’s dream. Did the dreamer wear the black dress, or did he see it in a dream? He takes it off or sees someone taking it off or makes someone wear the black dress, and also the difference in the scenes: Did the single person, married, pregnant or someone else see him? Together, let us learn about the most exciting interpretations of seeing a black dress in a dream through our Egyptian website. Interpretation of a dream about a black dress in a dream: The color black is unpleasant for some, but it has different interpretations related to the dreamer’s condition. If a person sees himself wearing a black dress in a dream, we consider the dreamer’s condition: If he is not accustomed to wearing it in reality, then he is worried, sad, and many problems will befall the dreamer. Ibn Sirin narrates several interpretations of this dream that differ depending on the dreamer. Wearing a black dress in a dream is generally considered inappropriate. Desirable, because it often indicates anxiety, sadness, and many problems. The interpretation of wearing it in a dream varies from one fortuneteller to another, depending on the nature of each person. , and indicates the achievement of goals and ambitions, especially if the color black in certain clothes such as: shirt, pants, covers, and mattresses. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is wearing fur of this color, this means that he will feel jealous of someone close to him and he will have to take care of everyone. If she sees herself wearing a black dress, this indicates that she is going through a bad emotional state, which may end up separating her from the person with whom she has a relationship. If a girl sees herself wearing black when someone dies, this indicates that she is going through a state of loneliness, anxiety, and tension due to her failure to A certain matter. If the sick person sees that he is wearing a black dress in his dream, this expresses the difficulty of recovering from the disease and its seriousness, which may lead to the death of the dreamer. Imam Al-Nabulsi narrated that if the dreamer dreams in his dream that he is wearing black clothes, this indicates a dispute between him and a person. Another, which is dreams that you are looking forward to seeing. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is wearing a black dress in an unusual way, this indicates poverty, illness, and the emergence of many problems and obstacles in his life. If a man sees himself wearing a dark black dress, this means that he will receive a promotion. A great job at work or he may have a trip to the desired place. If he sees that he is wearing black pants, this indicates that he is surrounded by many haters and hypocrites who wish for his downfall and failure, in the event that he does not

title: What if you dreamed of a mouse? What is Ibn Sirin's interpretation?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a mouse: This vision causes anxiety to everyone who sees it, and the dreamer is confused in its interpretation and feels disgust. Therefore, we present to everyone the interpretation of a dream about a mouse, with all its details and differences, for all categories of people, whether a girl, married, divorced, a young man or a young man. I dreamed of a mouse. What is the interpretation of the dream? The mouse is a symbol of crises and quarrels. In the family, the betrayal of friends or the failure of the business to go well, and killing him is a sign of the fortuneteller’s imminent victory over his opponents, but if he manages to escape, it means continuing problems and crises. The dream in a girl’s dream may symbolize that enemies are waiting for her, but they are not clear And they deceive her, but if they are in her clothes, this means that she will be exposed to a scandal. A mouse in a dream symbolizes a disreputable woman, a Jew, a Jew, or a thief, and the dreamer must beware of this person, and injuring her skin means that the dreamer will obtain money from a woman. Disabled. If the number of rats that the dreamer saw in his dream was large, this indicates the entry of immoral women into his home. Seeing them in a dream indicates material damage to the dreamer, disappointment and disillusionment in his work and also symbolizes the loss of a lot of money, but if he sees a group of Mice in his dream, the correct interpretation is the opposite. From the previous interpretation, meaning that he will get a lot of food. If it is one of the rats in the sewers, this reflects how afraid the viewer is of the world because he is surrounded by many enemies. The most important interpretations of seeing a mouse in a dream. I dreamed of a white mouse. What is the interpretation of the dream? To see a white mouse symbolizes Satan and he It indicates the succession of night and day and the theft of the afternoon, and seeing him searching for something indicates the thief’s concern for the beholder. Seeing him in a dream about the Virgin Mary symbolizes the presence of a thief trying to get close to her, so she must be careful. If the dreamer is pregnant, this means that she will feel some feelings Negativity after childbirth, in addition to her feeling of insecurity, tension, and a constant feeling of anxiety. As for a married woman, the vision means that she likes to talk about others in his absence, and that she is a woman of weak character and does not trust herself. I dreamed of a black rat. What is the interpretation of the dream? Interpretation of a dream about a black rat. Narrated by Ibn Sirin A black rat in a dream means that the dreamer is hated by a group of women who are trying to harm him if he sees a group of black rats. The entry of rats into the house generally indicates an abundance of food. If someone is sick, the dream becomes a good omen and a happy omen that he will recover. Soon he will fall ill and that he will live a long time. If large numbers of black rats are found in a well where there is no water or in an uninhabited place, it is interpreted that the dreamer’s life is short. If the rat is searching for something, then in this case it symbolizes the presence of A person wants to tarnish his reputation. As for his inability to catch him, he is a victim of fraud. I dreamed of a dead mouse, so what is the interpretation of the dream? Killing a mouse in a dream symbolizes the presence of a paralyzed woman or reprimanding a woman who has no morals, and the death of a mouse symbolizes the poverty of the people in the situation.
